info.title: Auctio API
info.description: API documentation for the Auctio application

get.description: Authenticate a user. Token can be provided via Authorization header or HttpOnly cookies.

200.description: User info retrieved successfully or token error.

post.description: Authenticate a user and provide access and refresh tokens.
Register a new user account.

400.description: Invalid input or reCAPTCHA verification failed.

post.description: Logout the current user by clearing authentication cookies.
Refresh the access token using a valid refresh token.
Verify the user email using the OTP code sent to their email.

post.summary: Create new OTP for email verification
post.description: Generate and send a new OTP code to the user email for verification.

500.description: Failed to generate or send OTP.

message.example: Failed to generate or send OTP

post.description: Send password reset email with token
Reset user password using reset token

post.summary: Place a bid on a product
post.description: Place a bid on a product

get.summary: Get bid history for a product
get.description: Get bid history for a product

get.summary: Get current winning bid for a product
get.description: Get current winning bid for a product

get.summary: Check if user can bid on product
get.description: Check if user can bid on product
Search products with filters (Vietnamese no-accent supported)
Get top 5 products for homepage

get.summary: Get products by category with pagination
get.description: Get products by category with pagination
Get product details by ID
Get all root categories with their children and product counts

post.description: Add product to watchlist

get.description: Get user watchlist

get.summary: Check if product is in watchlist
get.description: Check if product is in watchlist
Get all questions and answers for a specific product

post.description: Ask a question about a specific product

content.example: What is the condition of this item?

message.example: Question submitted. Seller will be notified via email.
Product ID and question content are required

post.description: Answer a question about your product (seller only)

content.example: The item is in excellent condition, barely used.

message.example: Answer posted. Asker will be notified via email.

get.description: Get current user profile
Get user profile by ID

post.description: Change password

get.description: Get user ratings

get.summary: Get ratings for a specific user
get.description: Get ratings for a specific user by ID

get.summary: Get products user is bidding on
get.description: Get products user is bidding on
Get products user has won

post.description: Rate a seller
Request upgrade to seller

get.description: Get all categories with pagination

post.description: Create a new category with optional parent category

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific category

put.description: Update category name or parent category

get.description: Get all products with pagination and filters
Get detailed information about a specific product
Get all users with pagination and role filter
Get detailed information about a specific user
Get all seller upgrade requests with pagination and status filter

post.description: Approve a seller upgrade request
Reject a seller upgrade request with reason

get.description: Get overall dashboard statistics for admin panel
Get user registration growth over specified time period
Get product creation growth over specified time period
Get top sellers ranked by revenue
Get top products ranked by bids or price
Get configuration data for seller including categories and subcategories for product form

post.description: Create a new auction product listing (seller only)

get.description: Get list of seller\'s currently active auction products
Get list of seller\'s completed auction products with winner information

patch.description: Add additional text to existing product description (seller only)

post.description: Block a specific bidder from placing bids on a product (seller only)
Rate the winner of a completed auction (+1 or -1) (seller only)
Cancel transaction with auction winner and automatically give negative rating (seller only)

message.example: Transaction cancelled and winner rated negatively

post.description: Answer a question asked by a bidder about a product (seller only)

content.example: This is the answer to your question...

get.description: Get all chat conversations for current user with pagination
Get total count of unread messages for current user
Get all messages for an order chat conversation

post.description: Send a message in order chat between buyer and seller

content.example: Hello, when can we arrange pickup?

post.description: Mark all messages in an order chat as read
Upload one or more product images to S3 storage

post.summary: Create ZaloPay payment order for seller upgrade
post.description: Generate ZaloPay payment URL for seller upgrade

post.summary: Create ZaloPay payment order for auction
post.description: Generate ZaloPay payment URL for auction winner payment
Webhook endpoint for ZaloPay to notify payment status
Mock payment callback for seller upgrade (simulates ZaloPay gateway)
